EuclideanNetwork, OrbisNetwork
public abstract class Network
extends java.lang.Object
implements Displayable

The abstract base class from which network types are derived.

Constructor Detail

Network

public Network()
Method Detail

setRandomSeed

public abstract void setRandomSeed(long seed)
By setting the seed of the internal random generator, network address creation will follow a repeatable pattern.

Parameters:
seed - value of the seed to be used to establish the random sequence. Use 0 for random addresses.

init

public abstract Network init()

addresses

public abstract java.util.Set<NetAddress> addresses()
Returns a set of the NetAddresss that lists all the nodes presently in the network.

Returns:
the set of the NetAddresss of the nodes in the network.

createAddress

public abstract NetAddress createAddress(MessageHandler handler)
Creates a new node address and a default endpoint that will be associated with the given message handler.

Parameters:
handler - - the default handler for all the messages sent to this address or endpoint.
Returns:
The newly created address.

replaceAddress

public abstract NetAddress replaceAddress(NetAddress other)
Request the network implementation to replace an existing address with a fresh one. Intended to allow nodes to go offline and then return later with a new address.

Parameters:
other - - the address being replaced.
Returns:
The replacement address.
